text: Egha me avir dafabagh amizɨ da mungue. Ezɨ mɨdorozir sababa itir gumaziba me me mɨsoghasa amuava avenge, me men ara ghue. Egha me gavgavir ekiaba puvatɨgha, gɨn me gavgavim isi. Egha me mɨdorozir gumazir gavgavibar otivigha, egha igharaz darazir modorozir gumaziba gɨntɨgha me mɨsogha me abɨni.
